name: Arthur Selle Jacobs
summary: First year PhD student in Computer Science, in the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul. Passionate about science and development, with strong will to learn about a multitude of subjects, and to build impacting and complex projects. Research interests include network management, Network Functions Virtualization, self-driving networks, programmable networks and artificial intelligence.
